languages.text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} instead of 2.

traits.locale_text: While the Adept is in half cover, Study Enemies costs 1 AP instead of 2.

Когда адепт находится за частичным укрытием, Изучение целей требует 1 вместо 2 ОД.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}时，{g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}分析敌人{/g}只消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，不再消耗2点。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} está en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analizar enemigos{/g} cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} en vez de 2.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el agente está en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, Analizar enemigos cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} en vez de 2.

traits.locale_text: Während der Agent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}halbe Deckung{/g} hat, kostet Feinde analysieren 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} anstatt 2.
